Text:
How do I remove this shit from my computer?
It's always coming errors and when I am playing like:
Timbaland - the way you are

its coming nelly furtado singel/album cover and on other songs too?? HOW DO I REMOVE THIS SHIT?!

nice work, ty! but on start i get "Failed to load DLL: foo_dsp_crossfader.dll
foo_dsp_skip_silence.dll
foo_dsp_soundtouch.dll
foo_dts.dll
foo_input_awma.dll
foo_input_mslive.dll
foo_input_reverse.dll
foo_masstag_addons.dll
foo_misc_addons.dll
foo_uie_wmpvis.dll"

what to do about it? :/

@JAGHETERPELLE
(...) 4. Install VC8 SP1 Runtimes. You can find it here: http://acropolis.lokalen.org/2006/10/foobar2000/my-foobar2000-components
Thanks for this. I was finding it a bit hard to customize my foobar2000, so I thought that someone else would have uploaded their own customization. I was lucky. Thanks again.

You should NOT use this release, because:

1. This is free software and should be downloaded from the official website: http://foobar2000.org/
Also see http://www.foobar2000.org/?page=FAQ
2. This version is outdated (current is 0.9.6.8) and filled with outdated, likely unstable plugins.
3. This release violates foobar2000 license: a custom installer is used.
